messages:
Name: Cengiz Ünder
Nationality: Türkiye
Date of Birth: July 14, 1997
Position: Attacker
Current club: Los Angeles
MLS clubs played for: Los Angeles

Cengiz Ünder is a Los Angeles attacker who has played in a strong number of the club's MLS matches in 2025, making 12 appearances overall and accumulating 442 minutes of playing time. He has been selected in the starting XI in four of these appearances across their 17 fixtures and been mostly used as a substitute on eight occasions.
üNder last featured in a MLS game on May 24, playing 18 minutes for Los Angeles versus Montréal in a 2-2 draw. In total, the attacker has netted two MLS goals in 2025, and registered two assists.
It was versus Seattle Sounders on May 14 when üNder last scored, netting in a 4-0 win. His opening goal of the campaign came in the 3-2 loss against San Diego on March 29.
In the side's next MLS match on July 5, Los Angeles face a trip to Austin.
In last season's Süper Lig, üNder featured in three games for Fenerbahçe.

üNder switched to Los Angeles on loan in February 2025 from Fenerbahçe, for whom he has made 27 league appearances in total, scoring nine goals and providing two assists, after joining the club in August 2023 from Olympique Marseille.
